title: NodeJS
text: I have hands-on experience working at AppBites, where I specialize in NestJS, Node.js, Prisma, MongoDB, and various other technologies. My role involves leveraging essential AWS services to develop efficient and scalable solutions. With a focus on innovation and precision, I contribute to creating cutting-edge applications and ensuring seamless user experiences at Appbites.

title: Php - internship
text: I completed a dynamic 3-month online internship at StarLabs, where I immersed myself in PHP and React technologies. During this experience, I honed my skills in web development, collaborating on innovative projects and gaining valuable real-world insights. My time at StarLabs enhanced my proficiency in both front-end and back-end technologies, preparing me for future challenges in the ever-evolving tech landscape.
